marker.ph: /// Defines a context for <see cref="DataLoader"/> instances. ...
/// Retrieves a cached loader for the given key, creating one if none is found. ...
/// Indicates whether loaders have been started. ...
/// Represents whether this context has finished executing loaders. ...
/// Starts firing pending loaders. ...
/// Queues a loader to be executed. ...
/* internal void AddToQueue(IDataLoader loader) ... */
/* Perform some action when the signal fires next. ... */
/// Perform some action when the signal fires next. ...
/// Represents ambient data local to the current load operation. ...
/// Sets the <see cref="DataLoaderContext"/> visible from the <see cref="DataLoaderContext.Current"/> property. ...
/// Runs code within a new loader context before firing any pending ...
/// Runs code within a new loader context before firing any pending ...
/// Collects keys into a batch to fetch in one request. ...
/// Creates a new <see cref="DataLoader{TKey,TReturn}"/>. ...
/// Creates a new <see cref="DataLoader{TKey,TReturn}"/> bound to the specified context. ...
/// Gets the bound context if set, otherwise the current ambient context. ...
/// Gets the keys to retrieve in the next batch. ...
/// Indicates the loader's current status. ...
/// Binds an instance to a particular loading context. ...
/// Loads an item. ...
/// Loads many items. ...
/// Triggers the fetch callback and fulfils any promises. ...
/// Provides a new <see cref="TaskCompletionSource{T}"/> paired with the given key. ...
